transcript:
Customer: aur dusra usse maine kaha tha baat karne ke liye.
Executive: Sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Tanu baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se aapne call kiya tha na morning pe customer bataiye sir kya issue tha?
Customer: Wo kya deal close karni hai IndiaMART ke through kaise ho sakti hai? Ek bylead consume kiya hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Aur wo final hone pe chal raha hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: To ab usse aise jaise usme IndiaMART ke through hi kiya hai. Hai na?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur kya bolte hai aur deal close hone wali hai. To mai usse ye bola maine ki hum IndiaMART ke IndiaMART ke verified seller hai. To ab isme IndiaMART ke through kaise kya kar sakte hai?
Executive: Kuch nahi aap buyer se baat kari buyer jab aap aap bol dijiye na buyer ko ki sir aap apna aapne catalog wagera bheja hai na buyer ko?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Buyer ko aap aap apna wo de dijiye na sub domain de dijiye wo khud hi dekh lega aapke sub domain pe to show hota hi hai aap apna whatsapp number boliyega ek baar.
Customer: 9784.
Executive: 9784.
Customer: 6383.
Executive: 638356 na ye to maine aapko bheja hai theek hai ye wala website www.indiamart.com seller seller power right? Hmm. Aap isko bhej dijiye buyer ko wo check kar lega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Usko ye bhi haan wo usko ye bhi ho jayega.
Executive: Bhai aapne IndiaMART se kara bhi hai right aur aap IndiaMART ke supplier bhi aap usse ye bata sakte ho suno. Aap final hone pe hai na deal aapki wo?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap usse ye bhi bata sakte ho na ki mai IndiaMART ka haan aap verified supplier ho sir achi cheez hai bas mai matlab aap ye bhej dijiyega usko aap wo check kar lega sir aapko agar kuch trust issue hai aap check kar lijiye mera catalog ye maine aapko catalog ka link aapko share kar diya hai aapke sub domain wala right? Aap isse share kar sakte hai kitne ka order mil raha hai aapko kitna order value hai aapka?
Customer: Jyada nahi 10 lakh rupaye ka.
Executive: 10 lakh ka hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sahi hai aapko 10 lakh ka order to kis ka matlab kis product ka hai aapka?
Customer: Solar ka.
Executive: Solar ka hmm. Accha accha accha isliye bolti hu na ki sir ek baar na aap verified ho jaiye TrustSeal pe to ye aapko verified seller to hai na.
Executive: IndiaMART TrustSeal verified abhi aap kaha verified seller hai aapke aur IndiaMART me registered hai aap TrustSeal verified kaha mahanga hai sir aap one year two year me kaha mahanga hai bataiye jara accha aap ye batao aapne 28 plus GST me MDC liya tha theek hai? Haan. March me aapka renewal hai theek hai wo renewal aapka teen mahina pahle generate ho jayega January me December me theek hai. Ab ab jo MDC ka price ho gaya hai na aap IndiaMART ki site pe jaake check kar lijiye corporate.indiamart.com pe ki waha pe na 35000 plus GST ka MDC ho gaya hai theek? Hmm. Ab aap 35 plus GST MDC ka de rahe hai aapne 35000 last year diya isi me aapka dono ka multiply karo itne me to aapka TrustSeal aa jayega. Two year ka thoda sa extra 4 5 10000 rupaye ka farak aata hai bas. Do saal me jitna aap ek ek saal ka MDC lete hai na usme aap 5 se 10000 10000 rupaye ka farak aata hai aapko TrustSeal bhi do saal ka plus isme aapka MDC basic ka TrustSeal aapka dono hi chalta rahega. Aur isme jo aapko ye itna karna pad raha hai na jab verified seller sir ho jate ho na to waha pe buyer na aankh band karke ekdam bharosa karta hai aapke upar. Kyuki dekhiye aapka jo product line hai na wo solar ka hai sir. Ab jaise battery ho gaya TV ho gaya washing machine ho gayi in sab cheezo me na sir thoda me bharosa nahi hoga kisi seller ke upar supplier ke upar to hum bahut doubt aata hai kharidne me chahe aap offline kharidne jao aur chahe online kharido. Hmm. Mai aapko kafi din se TrustSeal bata rahi hu. Lekin aap aap bhi comfortable ho gaye hai na ki chalo isme order mil raha hai to hame need hi nahi hai aisa nahi hai sir itna comfortable mat hoiye kisi bar koi buyer na abhi aapka kah sakta hai. Aap ye link bhej ke dekhiye jaise aap jo aapko cheez aap kar rahe ho na. Chalo link bhej ke dekhta hu uske baad dekhte hai. Aur sir ye kah rahi thi mai aapse hello. Hello. Haan. Mai ye bol rahi hu aapse ki abhi services wagera ka feedback kaisa hai services wagera sahi se aa rahi hai aapko? Byleads wagera to aapne abhi chalu ki hai. Wapas kya chalu kiya use karna? Hmm. Accha to ye sir aapka local ka hai ki pan India level ka hai aapka ye? Abhi to local hai pan India ki taiyari kar rahe hai. Accha accha to aap accha aap IndiaMART to sir aap hi handle karte hai na? Hmm. Ki koi team wagera aapne hire kar li hai? Nahi abhi nahi ki. Accha accha to aap aap khud hi matlab accha ye aapka jo mail id hai na IndiaMART me jo aapka registered mail hai wo mail id aapko pata hai kaun sa mail hai? sellerpower2022@gmail.com. Haan haan haan usse mai ye concern aapka close kar deti hu. Theek hai jo aapne concern raise kiya hai buyer ke liye haan aur suniye na usme na sir ek feedback jayega usme aap satisfied karke na satisfied mark kar dijiyega yes yes kar dijiyega theek hai? Okay. Wo feedback mere liye hai theek hai? Theek hai sir? Theek hai. Hello. Abhi mai jaise hi feedback jayega to aapko mai call kar dungi theek hai to ek baar mera call utha lijiyega wo feedback mujhe submit karwana to aap feedback submit kar dijiyega theek hai? Theek hai. Theek hai sir concern close kar deti hu usi mail pe jayega theek hai satisfied karna hai aapko theek hai yes karna hai. Hmm hmm. Theek hai sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know deal closing process.

- Customer asks about IndiaMART benefits.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to share catalog link.

- Executive suggested TrustSeal for better trust.

- Executive asked for feedback on services.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send the link to the buyer.

- Customer will submit feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, catalog, verified seller
